name: Cube Runner (BETA)
description:
Cube Runner is a free addictive 3D game  made by a 13 year old kid which has only 3 easy levels lol. Anyways this game is still in an early stage of development and a start to my game development career. Hope you enjoy this game!

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Press A - For Moving Left

Press D - For Moving Right

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Also note that this is a PC game and you will have to extract the files once the game is downloaded into a folder and then enjoy the game!
